Introduction.

Hi, i guess you are here because you have purchased the awesome Chabod portfolio website template, if you have'nt, heres a link to do so right now - Buy Chabod Now

About Chabod.

Chabod is an amazing portfolio website template built with the bootstrap framework. Chabod comes with 6 different sections to help sellers show their professional profile. While remaining as engaging as possible. Chabod is a simple single page static website, with pop-up features like a project story panel for sharing project stories and a blog panel for displaying blog stories.

Getting Started.

Chabod is built with different front end web development tools and this documentation guides you through as much as is needed to get a hand an them and customize Chabod into the portfolio website of your dream.

Chabod build Stack/Tools.

Chabod is built with the following tools:

  • HTML.
  • CSS.
  • SASS.
  • Bootstrap 5.
  • Vanilla Javascript
  • Ts Particles and
  • Gulp Js
